content: crochet raised brick baby blanket - this lovely little blanket has a finished effect of a colourful brick wall lol i think it is due to the yarn and stitch that i used simple and quick to crochet makes an ideal baby shower gift the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 29 5 x 27 5 inches level intermediate copyright ©2024 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-raised-brick-baby-blanket/
